servinfo.title: Keyless Entry System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped)

item.ptxt: Confirm that power door lock system is in good condition before referring to the following possible causes.
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: All door can not be locked / unlocked by only keyless entry transmitter

action.ptxt: Replace battery referring to Replacement of Transmitter Battery (Other than Keyless Start Model) .
Check door switch referring to Door Switch (Front / Rear / Rear End Door) Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Key reminder switch in ignition switch faulty

action.ptxt: Check ignition switch referring to Ignition Switch Inspection .
Check keyless entry receiver referring to Keyless Entry Receiver and Its Circuit Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Interior light does not light when doors are unlocked by keyless entry transmitter

action.ptxt: Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Hazard warning lights do not light when doors are locked/unlocked by keyless entry transmitter

ps.ptxt: Turn signal and hazard warning relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check turn signal and hazard warning relay referring to Turn Signal and Hazard Warning Relay Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Transmitter code can not be programmed to BCM

action.ptxt: Check door switch referring to Door Switch (Front / Rear / Rear End Door) Inspection .
Check keyless entry receiver referring to Keyless Entry Receiver and Its Circuit Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Key reminder switch in ignition switch faulty

action.ptxt: Check ignition switch referring to Ignition Switch Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
